  • Constructor Details

    • ParallaxBG

      public ParallaxBG(String file, GameObject[] backgrounds, Ground ground, boolean followGround)
      Constructor. Sets the background's speed less than the player's speed, so it has a parallax effect.
      Parameters:
      file - the file that contains the image
      backgrounds - the backgrounds
      ground - reference to the ground
      followGround - boolean value to see if we are doing the ground pieces or the background ones.

    • serialize

      public String serialize(int tabSize)
      Serializes the background of the object in case we will ever need to make the user choose it in the level creator.
      Specified by:
      serialize in class Serialize
      Parameters:
      tabSize - number of tabs to be indented correctly
      Returns:
